md:
giải nghĩa từ "healthier" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Healthier (adjective)

* Meaning: more healthy or in better condition
* Vietnamese: khỏe hơn, tốt hơn cho sức khỏe

Example sentence: Eating a balanced diet can help you feel healthier and more energetic.

Related words: healthy, health, healthy food, healthy lifestyle, wellness.

Note: The suffix "-ier" is used to form the comparative form of an adjective, indicating a greater degree of a particular quality. In this case, "healthier" is the comparative form of "healthy", indicating a greater degree of healthiness.

Example sentence: Eating a balanced diet can help you feel healthier and more energetic.
